fields.headline: Live music booking now
fields.bodyText: Prepare the maracas and glo-sticks as the Happy Mondays return (19–20 Dec, Roundhouse, NW1). Support comes from the evergreen 808 State … For younger ravers, Bristol's answer to The Warehouse Projects enters its third year, and the In:Motion (29 Sep-1 Jan) lineups are finally out of the bag, with Grimes, Public Enemy and Wiley all playing … After a summer of tramping around Ibiza and the festivals, Example heads out on his own UK arena tour in 2013 (11 Feb–1 Mar, tour begins BIC, Bournemouth) giving everyone the chance to jump around like spacehoppers … For those looking for something considerably harder, punks Gallows are hitting the road (3-20 Oct, tour begins The Haunt, Brighton) … Expect to hear new tracks from their self-titled album which is out in September. Former Mercury Music Prize nominee, Kathryn Williams is on a tour of cosy venues (2 Oct–1 Nov, tour begins The Louisiana, Bristol) and American folkster Josephine Foster is also out (29 Oct–6 Nov, Leaf, Liverpool) touring her album Blood Rushing.
